content: barry bead crochet beanie is a funky textured crochet beanie featuring a modified bead stitch if you love richly textured accessories that are fun and cosy to wear this beanie will be perfect for you learn a new stitch - the modified bead stitch video tutorial provided for ease of learning no set gauge this is a stress-free make simply size the beanie according to the sizing table use any dk or worsted yarn thanks to tania barry @shewgirlscrochetcreations on ig shewgirl on ravelry - for hooking and inspiring this fun variation of the momentum beanie 1 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/momentum-beanie
